name: test_mattermost_db
description:
Deploy Mattermost to test the 'db' relation.

    Mattermost needs TLS enabled on PostgreSQL to correctly connect to it.

    Args:
        ops_test: The ops test framework
descriptionHtml:
Deploy Mattermost to test the 'db' relation.

Mattermost needs TLS enabled on PostgreSQL to correctly connect to it.

Args:
    ops_test: The ops test framework

items.statusDetails:
AssertionError: TLS is not being used on pg_rewind connections
assert 'connection authorized: user=rewind database=postgres SSL enabled' in '/var/log/postgresql/postgresql-4_0228.log:2024-08-08 02:28:22 UTC [480]: user=operator,db=postgres,app=[unknown],client=10.194.155.3,line=5 LOG:  statement: GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE postgres TO "rewind";\n/var/log/postgresql/postgresql-4_0234.log:2024-08-08 02:34:51 UTC [4145]: user=operator,db=postgres,app=[unknown],client=10.194.155.3,line=4 LOG:  statement: CREATE TABLE pgrewindtest (testcol INT);\n'
juju.errors.JujuError: resolving ch:self-signed-certificates : resolving with preferred channel: Post "https://api.charmhub.io/v2/charms/refresh": dial tcp: lookup api.charmhub.io: i/o timeout

Exception: Expected command su postgres -c "/usr/lib/postgresql/14/bin/pg_ctl -D /var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata promote" to succeed instead it failed: pg_ctl: server did not promote in time
